column1: Hypothesis Testing Problem Solution - Using Excel T.TEST Function

A company claims that the average weight of their product packages is 500 grams. A quality control inspector randomly selects 10 packages and weighs them. Test whether the company's claim is valid at a 5% significance level.

column2: μ ≠ 500 (The mean weight is not 500 grams)

column1: Step 4: Calculate Test Statistic Using Excel

column2: For proper calculation, use the formula in the cell above
T.TEST(array1, array2, tails, type) where tails=2 for two-tailed, type=1 for paired
T.INV.2T returns the two-tailed critical value
Since p-value > 0.05, we fail to reject the null hypothesis. There is insufficient evidence to conclude that the average package weight differs from 500 grams.
